attribute.name: summary
attribute.value: MEPS (MetCoOp-Ensemble Prediction System) is a convection-permitting atmosphere ensemble model covering Scandinavia and the Nordic Seas. It has horizontal resolution of 2.5 km, has 65 vertical levels and 10 members. MEPS is ran four times daily (00,06,12,18) with three-hourly cycling for data assimilation. Member 0 and 1 are ran up to 66 hours, the rest up to 48 hours. Boundary data is from ECMWF, and initial perturbations are based on the SLAF method. Model code based on HARMONIE cy40h1.1

attribute.name: formula_terms
attribute.value: ap: ap%EXT% b: b%EXT% ps: surface_air_pressure p0: p0%EXT%
